name: Loop.
description:
How many loops do you need to get it right?

A2O2 entry please be gentle this is my first completed small game hehe I just wanna get into it yuh and learn how to integrate Live2D to games. Let me know if anything doesn't work I sincerely don't know if the Mac files work or not thank you
